editorialNotes.short: Spark new ideas for your next work of art.

editorialNotes.standard: On desktop, this won our Mac App of the Year Award, providing tools to lay out anything from posters and brochures to books and magazines. The iPad version lets you do all this and more with an interface optimized for touchscreen.

Vector art is remarkably usefulâyou can create completely scalable works simply by manipulating a variety of shapes. Assembly shines with accessible and intuitive features that let designers of all skill levels quickly add gorgeous objects to their photos or make artwork from the ground up. Thanks to a refined interface, you can alter your drawings easily on both iPad and iPhone. Plus, with a suite of smart sharing tools, itâs easy to collaborate with other designers.
editorialNotes.short: Stack, layer and build original designs using huge element library.
